name: My Access Program
tag_list: microsoft-access, access-database, access-programming, access-forms, access-reports, access-tables, access-data, access-program, access-help, ms-access, access-database-programming
overview: Assisting companies with Microsoft Access database programming to gain more centralized automation within a single integrated software program has been the main purpose of MyAccessProgram.com. The following services are offered: â€¢Improvements to existing Access databases, by adding features or fixing poor performance or reliability. â€¢Microsoft Access software development training. â€¢User-friendly forms and sub forms that offer custom user menus, self-updating drop down lists, on-screen help, data validation. â€¢Basic business services such as invoicing, order tracking, accounting, inventory, jobs estimates, scheduling, contact management, work flow time tracking, approval sign offs, and many more specialized tasks can all be handled using Microsoft Access. Just dream it up and we’ll create it. â€¢Recommendations to increase your organization’s productivity and income. â€¢Access version upgrades. â€¢Automated email from Microsoft Access database. â€¢Email automation “Mail Merge” from Microsoft Access database. â€¢Reports, sub-reports and graphs in Microsoft Access or Excel that filter data based by selected filters on an Access form. â€¢Remote location support for Access versions 2 through 2007 using computer control software. â€¢Automation of Excel and Word while never leaving Access â€¢Custom programming functions that execute your required business logic and tasks using Microsoft’s Visual Basic for Applications programming language (VBA). â€¢External data access using Microsoft Hyperlinks to open stored files based on database-stored hyperlink addresses.
